subject: Doping (Sports)
Tamoxifen (Drug)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: The two-time Olympic swimmer Lubos Krizko has been banned for two years after testing positive for tamoxifen, a drug used in treatment for breast cancer.
snippet: The two-time Olympic swimmer Lubos Krizko has been banned for two years after testing positive for tamoxifen, a drug used in treatment for breast cancer.
